answers.answer: MedZirka offers free consultations from a family doctor, therapist, or pediatrician.

answers.answer: Individuals can receive free online or offline medical services from MedZirka after filling in the declaration.

answers.answer: At the Health Promotion Center, refugees can receive free medical consultations and access to some medical services.
